description: This Java interface defines the service layer for managing product entities, including methods for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting products.

classes.name: ProductService
classes.description: Service interface for managing products, providing methods to create, retrieve, update, and delete products.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new product with the provided data encapsulated in ProductRequest.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Fetches a product by its unique ID.

methods.name: getAll
methods.description: Retrieves a list of all products.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing product identified by ID with new data.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a product identified by ID.
